reuters.title: (CORRECTED) - <TRANSALTA UTILITIES CORP> YEAR NET
reuters.body: Shr 81 cts vs 2.78 dlrs Net 53.5 mln vs 180.9 mln Revs 915.5 mln vs 836.0 mln Note: 1986 net includes 125 mln dlr or 1.90 dlr shr writedown of investment in <Canada Northwest Energy Ltd> vs yr-ago extraordinary loss of 17 cts shr (net fig not given). Reuter 
